plot: Jon Bang Carlsen interweaves his Danish post-war childhood memories with the stories of two Jewish Auschwitz survivors, who eventually became part of the white elite of South Africa during Apartheid.
title: Purity Beats Everything
plot_es: Jon Bang Carlsen interweaves his Danish post-war childhood memories with the stories of two Jewish Auschwitz survivors, who eventually became part of the white elite of South Africa during Apartheid.
plot_en: Jon Bang Carlsen interweaves his Danish post-war childhood memories with the stories of two Jewish Auschwitz survivors, who eventually became part of the white elite of South Africa during Apartheid.
